entry.tran: 新的;刚出现的;新做的;新建的
entry.def: Something that is new has been recently created, built, or invented or is in the process of being created, built, or invented.

example.ex: They've just opened a new hotel in the Stoke area...
example.tran: 他们刚在斯托克地区开了一家新宾馆。

example.ex: The new invention ensures the beer keeps a full, frothy head.
example.tran: 这项新发明能保证啤酒始终保持丰富的泡沫。

entry.def: Something that is new has not been used or owned by anyone.

example.ex: That afternoon she went out and bought a new dress...
example.tran: 那天下午她出门买了一件新裙子。

example.ex: There are many boats, new and used, for sale...
example.tran: 有很多新旧不一的船待售。

entry.def: You use new to describe something which has replaced another thing, for example because you no longer have the old one, or it no longer exists, or it is no longer useful.

example.ex: Under the new rules, some factories will cut emissions by as much as 90 percent...
example.tran: 按照新规定，一些工厂的减排量要高达90%。

example.ex: I had been in my new job only a few days...
example.tran: 我到新的工作岗位只有几天的时间。

entry.def: New is used to describe something that has only recently been discovered or noticed.

example.ex: The new planet is about ten times the size of the earth.
example.tran: 新发现的行星大约是地球的10倍那么大。

entry.tran: (一天或一年)新开始的，初始的
entry.def: A new day or year is the beginning of the next day or year.

example.ex: The start of a new year is a good time to reflect on the many achievements of the past...
example.tran: 新年伊始是反思过去一年诸多成就的好时机。

example.ex: The next election is for the government to take us into the new century.
example.tran: 下次选举要选出带领我们进入新世纪的政府。

entry.def: New is used to describe someone or something that has recently acquired a particular status or position.

example.ex: ...the usual exhaustion of a new mother...
example.tran: 刚做妈妈的人通常会有的疲惫感

example.ex: The Association gives a free handbook to all new members.
example.tran: 协会给新成员人手一本免费手册。

entry.def: If you are new to a situation or place, or if the situation or place is new to you, you have not previously seen it or had any experience of it.

example.ex: She wasn't new to the company...
His name was new to me then and it stayed in my mind...
example.tran: 当时我是第一次听到他的名字，就记住了。

entry.tran: (土豆、胡萝卜、豆子等)时鲜的，早的
entry.def: New potatoes, carrots, or peas are produced early in the season for such vegetables and are usually small with a sweet flavour.
